page.title: 13GROUPS AT CROPWELL BUTLER
page.content: The{Toddler Group}and the{Playgroup} have a very important role in the life of the three villages. Young parents and children are given the opportunity to meet, have a cup of tea, and relieve for a little time the stresses of the difficult task of bringing up young children.The Toddler Group meets on Friday mornings only & all parents must accompany their toddler. The Playgroup meets on Tuesday, Thursday & Friday from 9:30 to 12-00. This Group has a small grant from the Social Services Department for toys, and employs a paid qualified Supervisor. Between 10 to 24 under-fives attend and voluntary helpers and even a Grandmother are always on hand. Sometimes one of the Rendezvous members plays his mouth-organ and his melodian for the children's delight.
